Name: XOXO
Ingredients: 10 ml Lustau San Emilio Pedro Ximénez Sherry
Instructions: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably block ice).
Review: A rich, chocolaty after dinner drink with cognac, pedro ximénez sherry, chocolate and orange liqueurs.
History: Created in 2015 by Josh Powell at Somerset House, Bristol.
Nutrition: One serving of XOXO contains 147 calories
